name: Personal Space (itch)
description:
Your friend left you alone at a party full of strangers. Your way out is blocked. Find a way out while avoiding an anxiety attack!

  • Standing near multiple people will give you anxiety. Same with bad text choices. 
  • New conversation topics will appear with different people based on what you know.

XBOX controller was used primarily during development, mouse and keyboard tested as well. If you press ESC during gameplay you will get an options menu with x/y sensitivity settings.

No optimization has been done, run on highest settings at your own risk!

I had a blast streaming the development of this one on twitch.tv/ursagames
